Class FieldTypeBean

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.wesleyware.daowiz.gui.FieldTypeBean
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class FieldTypeBean
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

Immutable representaion of the db field type Contains only data/methods of interest to the GUI interface This object is serialized as part of the GUI save mechanism

Author:
Wesley Williams
